comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of experiments of type 1 and y be the number of experiments of type 2. Both x and y are non-negative integers.",
    "CONSTRAINS": {
        "Red Liquid Constraint Exp1": "3x + 5y \leq 80",
        "Blue Liquid Constraint Exp1": "4x + 3y \leq 70",
        "Red Liquid Constraint Exp2": "5x + 3y \leq 80",
        "Blue Liquid Constraint Exp2": "3x + 4y \leq 70",
        "Smelly Gas Constraint Exp1": "x + 2y \leq 1",
        "Smelly Gas Constraint Exp2": "2x + 3y \leq 2",
        "Total Smelly Gas Constraint": "x + y \leq 10",
        "Total Green Gas Constraint": "5x + 6y \leq M"
    },
    "OBJECTIVE": "Maximize 6x + 5y"
}
